## Research Manuscripts

Our team regularly publishes research manuscripts, technical papers, and case studies on various topics in cybersecurity, cloud computing, and software development. These are available in multiple formats to suit your needs.

```{=html}
<div class="alert alert-info" role="alert">
  <h4 class="alert-heading"><i class="bi bi-info-circle"></i> About Quarto Manuscripts</h4>
  <p>Our research papers and technical documents are published as Quarto Manuscripts, providing multiple ways to engage with the content:</p>
  <ul>
    <li>Read online with interactive elements and navigation</li>
    <li>Download as PDF for offline reading and printing</li>
    <li>Access as MS Word documents for editing and comments</li>
    <li>View source notebooks to explore the computational aspects</li>
  </ul>
  <p>This approach promotes open science and transparency in our research.</p>
</div>
```
